model_info.description: Qwen2.5-7B-Instruct-Turbo is a compact instruction-tuned large language model from Alibaba Cloud's Qwen team, hosted on Together AI. It features 7.61 billion parameters, a 131,072-token context window, and FP8 quantization for optimized inference speed. The model excels in mathematical reasoning, coding, and multilingual tasks while supporting multimodal interactions (text + image).
use_cases: Code generation, debugging, and programming assistance
Structured data processing and JSON generation
Multimodal applications combining text and image analysis
strengths: FP8 quantization enables faster inference while maintaining high performance
131,072-token context window supports long-text processing and complex multi-step tasks
Significant benchmark improvements: MMLU 74.2 (↑3.9), MATH 75.5 (↑22.6) over predecessor
Multimodal capabilities for text-image interactions and JSON generation
Strong multilingual support (12+ languages including Chinese, English, and Arabic)
Cost-effective at $0.30 per million tokens compared to larger models
limitations: 7B parameter size may lag behind larger models on highly complex tasks
FP8 quantization introduces minor accuracy trade-offs in edge cases
Performance degrades with extremely long contexts (128K+ tokens)
Requires careful prompt engineering for optimal results
Limited to 7B parameters vs 72B variants for extreme performance needs
